titleStmt.title: Information Processing — Text and Office Information Systems – Standard Generalized Markup Language

spec.scope: Meta language for Creating Markup Languages

info.p: SGML is an ISO-standardized meta language containing both a concrete syntax for serializing SGML documents (instances) and a formalism for describing document grammars (DTD). In addition to the concrete syntax for SGML instances, user can also define custom syntaxes in SGML.

imprint.biblScope: Gives a thorough overview over SGML and includes an annotated version of the full SGML standard.

info.p: SGML is a superclass of XML.
